Verb *introduce*
*****************

Documentation for the introduce verb in */cmds/verbs/introduce.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``introduce``
 |  ``introduce yourself``
 |  ``introduce myself``
 |  ``introduce yourself to <someone>``
 |  ``introduce myself to <someone>``
 |  ``introduce to <someone>``

Introduce yourself to someone or everyone in the room.
